titleInfo.title: Certificate of enlistment for Dennis Morgan for U. S. colored troops

name.namePart: United States -- War Dept -- Adjutant-General's Office

mods.abstract: One-sheet certificate of enlistment for Dennis Morgan, a Colored man whom W. H. Morgan claims as his slave, April 5, 1864.
